backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor implementing booking management, service rates, time slot availability, image paths, and user profiles with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and blob storage via MixinStorage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that strips the legacy `caffeineAdminToken` field from the old actor state, returning an empty new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features (removing auth gates on /riyaz and ensuring anonymous admin actor initialization) to their relevant frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary document describing the purpose and key behaviors of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React SPA with SEO meta tags, Google Fonts, and Google Ads/Analytics gtag script for the Ceiling Pro service.
frontend/public/googlea0b8f9f5757853f9.h: Google Search Console site verification file containing the verification token string.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with three routes (/, /riyaz, /account) and wraps the app in a React Query QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookingsTa: Admin bookings table component with sortable columns, CSV export, and a refresh button that fetches all bookings via useGetAllBookings with no authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImagesEdit: Admin component for managing service card images and hero image URL, supporting file uploads with progress tracking and saving paths via React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ServiceRat: Admin form component for viewing and updating per-square-foot pricing for POP & Gypsum, PVC, and Wall Molding services.
frontend/src/components/admin/TimeSlotsE: Admin component that displays toggle switches for enabling or disabling four booking time slots (10 AM, 1 PM, 4 PM, 7 PM) and saves availability via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Customer-facing booking form component that collects service, date, time slot, and contact details, validates input, submits a booking mutation, and shows a success message.
frontend/src/components/booking/bookingV: Utility function that validates booking form fields (name, mobile, location, property type, service, date, time slot) and returns an errors map with a validity flag.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Float: Fixed floating button that links to a WhatsApp chat URL using the configured phone number, normalizing it to include the India country code.
frontend/src/components/conversion/Stick: Mobile-only sticky bottom bar with a 'Book Consultation' button that triggers a provided onClick callback.
frontend/src/components/estimate/Estimat: Interactive estimate calculator that computes a cost based on entered area and selected service using dynamic service rates, or shows an inspection-required message for inspection-based services.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with company info, contact details from config, a services list, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Sticky top navigation header with a logo link, an Account button, and a call-to-action phone button using the app config.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Marketing section displaying phone, email, and service area contact info sourced from CEILING_PRO_CONFIG.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Galler: Before/after image gallery section that accepts optional custom image paths or falls back to default generated assets.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HeroSe: Full-width hero section with a background image, headline, tagline, and Book Consultation / Call Now CTAs.
frontend/src/components/marketing/HowItW: Three-step process section (Book, Site Visit, Installation) with icons and a connecting line for desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Review: Displays three hardcoded five-star customer reviews in a card grid layout.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper with white/grey variant styling and an optional scroll-reveal animation via useRevealOnScroll.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Renders service cards from the SERVICES domain list with optional custom images, image error fallback, and a Book Now button that sets booking prefill state.
frontend/src/components/marketing/WhyCho: Marketing section highlighting three reasons to choose Ceiling Pro (Affordable, Skilled Experts, On-Time Delivery) with icons.
frontend/src/config/ceilingPro.ts: Exports a single config object containing the business phone, WhatsApp number, and email address.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: Empty file with no content; likely a placeholder for an admin authentication context.
frontend/src/domain/services.ts: Defines the Service interface, the SERVICES array with four ceiling service entries, and a getServiceRate helper that resolves pricing from service rates or defaults.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (anonymous or authenticated) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Re-exports `useActor` as `useAdminActor` for admin operations; no special token is required since all admin methods are open to any caller.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuth.ts: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all bookings, fetching the caller's bookings, and creating a new booking via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useImagePaths.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating image paths (hero, service cards, gallery) stored in the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Provides mutation hooks for uploading a single image or multiple images to the backend actor, with file type and size validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using `@dfinity/auth-client`, exposing login, logout, identity, and status state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that calls `actor.isCallerAdmin()` to check whether the current caller has admin privileges, caching the result for 5 minutes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRevealOnScroll.ts: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to set a visibility flag when an element scrolls into view, respecting the user's reduced-motion preference.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRates.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating service rates (POP gypsum, PVC, wall molding) from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimeSlotAvailabili: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and updating the availability of four daily time slots from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the authenticated caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a light/dark theme with a natural green and beige palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped in `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Account page that handles login, profile setup, profile editing, and displays the user's booking history using Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that composes the images editor, service rates editor, time slots editor, and bookings table into a single management interface.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component that composes all marketing and booking sections, handles smooth scrolling to the booking section, and converts stored images to URLs for child components.
frontend/src/state/bookingPrefill.ts: Zustand store that manages a preselected service string used to prefill and auto-scroll to the booking section.
frontend/src/utils/notifications.ts: Utility module wrapping the browser Web Notifications API to request permission and show a booking confirmation notification, failing silently if unavailable.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom OKLCH-based color tokens, typography, border radius, animations, and plugins (typography, container-queries, animate).
project_state.json: Project state document tracking version, feature list, architectural decisions, and known issues for the Ceiling Pro booking website build.
